entry.title: I do it because I can
entry.summary:
I was delighted to find another backtesting framework wrote in Python，which is called backtrader.

I have tried a few backtesting frameworkds wrote in Python, but this project looks really impressive.

Author of the project has explained the reasons why he'd started this project -

One of the questions often asked …
entry.content:
I was delighted to find another backtesting framework wrote in Python，which is called backtrader.

I have tried a few backtesting frameworkds wrote in Python, but this project looks really impressive.

Author of the project has explained the reasons why he'd started this project -

One of the questions often asked by friends is

Why? Is there no other platform which can do it?

Indeed! But as I do usually answer:

I do it because I can

I think this world needs more people like you. Just do it.

entry.title: Never complain, never explain.
entry.summary:
Never complain, never explain. Resist the temptation to defend yourself or make excuses. ― Brian Tracy

翻译成中文大概是这个意思：

不抱怨，不解释。抵制一切为自己辩解和找借口的诱惑和理由。

今天偶然看到的，深以为然。回想之前工作中自己对一些琐碎事情的抱怨，真的是很惭愧。

同时为自己设一个挑战，接下来的30天里，争取每天做到零抱怨。
